name: python_exec
description: Execute Python code in isolated sandbox environment

error_hints.SyntaxError: Check for missing colons, parentheses, or indentation errors.
error_hints.NameError: Variable or function not defined. Make sure to define it before using.
error_hints.TypeError: Wrong argument type. Check function signatures and parameter types.
error_hints.IndexError: List index out of range. Verify len(list) > index before accessing.
error_hints.KeyError: Dictionary key not found. Use .get(key, default) or check with 'if key in dict'.
error_hints.ZeroDivisionError: Division by zero. Add check for divisor != 0.
error_hints.ImportError: Module not found. Use only standard library imports.
error_hints.AttributeError: Object doesn't have this attribute. Check object type.
error_hints.ValueError: Invalid value for operation. Validate input before processing.
